name: Murder Royale The Game
description:
This is a bad Hunger Games simulator where you play the game as a tribute and probably die.

There are 8 "fun" minigames, 800 unique items, and over 1,000 unique phrases! Plus other stuff like custom name and item implementation and a buggy leaderboard.

I don't know if i'll ever update this because my code is such a mess that I don't wanna touch it ever again. Enjoy!
